mapper.select: SELECT c.class_id AS classId, f.file_url AS thumbNail, c.user_id AS userId, c.class_title AS classTitle, c.class_price AS classPrice FROM class c LEFT JOIN file f ON c.class_id = f.file_ref_no

SELECT c.class_id AS classId, c.class_title AS title, c.user_id AS instructor, c.class_price AS price, f.file_url AS thumbnail, c.description AS description, c.class_capsule AS classCapsule, c.class_subtitle AS classSubtitle, c.class_category AS classCategory, c.class_recom AS classRecom, c.class_level AS classLevel FROM class c LEFT JOIN file f ON c.class_id = f.file_ref_no WHERE c.class_id = #{id}
